title: Quirks (18+) Improbable Heroine Volume One
description: Stephen Track is a seasoned off-the grid agent with a penchant for stumbling into dire straits. Jestin Quigley could be just the oddity that he is looking for to help overcome a world-wide ecological disaster.First, Stephen must discern whether she is a threat to the underground operation he works for and, secondly, it is imperative that he remain sharp while fighting off a growing attraction to her.A fast-paced thriller, this dark adventure will lead you into uncharted territories. ADULT CONTENT.
author: Ann Jet Sieg
